import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib

%matplotlib inline

matplotlib.rcParams['font.size'] = 14
matplotlib.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (9, 5)
matplotlib.rcParams['figure.facecolor'] = '#00000000'

dataset_df['Price'] = pd.to_numeric(dataset_df.Price.str.replace('$',''),errors='coerce')
source.e7fd64b3:
### Converting Installs column to numeric

dataset_df['Installs'] = pd.to_numeric(dataset_df.Installs.str.replace(',','').str.replace('+',''), errors='coerce')

source.0736377c:
## Inferences and Conclusion

In this notebook we have did Exploratory Data Analysis on Google Play Store Apps datset. We have drawn interesting inferences from this dataset.

- Based on the dataset we can infer that most of the Apps in play store belongs to Family and Gaming categories followed by Tools, Medical and Business.
- Also based on the type metric it seems that only 7.5% of apps are paid and around 92% of apps are free to install.
- From the ratings it appears that people are tend to give ratings in the range of 3 to 5
- As far as genre is concern then most of the Apps are from Tools Genres followed by Entertainment, Education and Medical.
- From Content Ratings we can infer that the 80% of the Apps are targeted to everyone.
- Based on the popularity, the apps in Gaming category were installed most number of time followed by Communication, Productivity and Social.
- Based on the number of installs, the Subway surfers app instlled most number of time followed by Google Photos, Instagram and Hangout.
- There are 17 Apps in Google play store which has more than 100 Mb of size
- Based on the reviews, Facebook, WhatsApp and instagram has most no of Reviews in google platy store.
- The app from Family Category has not updated since 3001 days in Google play store
source.855db516:
Most columns have the data type object, either because they contain values of different types, or they contain empty values, which are represented using NaN. It appears that most of the columns contains some empty values, since the Non-Null count is lower than the total number of rows (10841). We'll need to deal with empty values and manually adjust the data type for each column on a case-by-case basis.

Only one column were detected as numeric columns (Rating), even though there are a few other columns which have mostly numeric values.
